title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Purpose-Driven e-Learning Modules for Understanding Leukemia

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain types of leukemia, diagnostic criteria, and treatment principles with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present a leukemia patient management protocol in three or more stages based on clinical scenarios.
Learners achieve a competency level of 3 or higher (out of 4) in case analysis assessments based on knowledge acquired through e-learning modules.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
